title: So Rito, those new skins look pretty close to Monster Hunter skins.
body:
Nice to see there are some Monster Hunter fans there.  Either that or, this was a huge coincidence.
May not seem like it to those of you who don't play the game, but it's quite obvious (and appreciated) for those of us that do.
Either way, I definitely look forward to more skins like these in the future!
Would love the Monster Hunter fan from Riot to post in this thread.  :3

[Beast Hunter Draven](http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xJ4qP-89kpE/VpaycOFS-XI/AAAAAAAA2rA/kqH8QRTo0Pg/s1600/342423.jpg)
[Monster Hunter Version](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/monsterhunter/images/9/92/FrontierGen-Hypnoruta_Armor_%28Both%29_%28Front%29_Render.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/300?cb=20140511102004)
[Other Version](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/monsterhunter/images/1/1d/GarugaBlademaster.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20091216102101) (Because his is kind of a combination of the two)

[Beast Hunter Tryndamere](http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mhLG1BthOpc/VpaxnD0ku4I/AAAAAAAA2qs/vL7Zkg5v9oE/s1600/trynd.jpg)
[Monster Hunter Version](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/monsterhunter/images/0/05/TigrexBlademaster.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20091216224747)

[Beast Hunter Sejuani](http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Rn9xLnU_D4k/VpaxcMw-qtI/AAAAAAAA2qk/L3M6MPXtzh0/s1600/sejuani.jpg)
[Monster Hunter Version](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v469/jungi/my-cosplay/wp03.jpg)

replies.body: Definitely not a coincidence! Monster Hunter was a big inspiration for these skins! ^-^ {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
ya im am teh monster hunet
Yeah they're monster hunter inspired ;) A lot of skins have a (sometimes vague) association with other games, pop culture or films.
Like Dragon Trainer Tristana is associated with "How To Train Your Dragon" and the Order of the Lotus skins are based on the same group in "Avatar the Last Airbender".
I was foolish to expect Riot to make Bloodborne-like skins for them when I've read their names. Ehhh..

Don't worry, I'm sure Vayne and a few others will get some Bloodborne skins eventually.
Haven't played Bloodborne myself, so I can't think of any cool ideas.
I was hopping {{champion:119}} will never have a 750 RP skin, but well..a man dream.
